data.eml:eml: A new genus of Castniinae (Lepidoptera Castniidae) with comments on comparative morphology and bionomics of its assigned species

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article González, Jorge M., López, Bernardo, Huerta, John Phill, Miller, Jacqueline Y. (2019): A new genus of Castniinae (Lepidoptera Castniidae) with comments on comparative morphology and bionomics of its assigned species. Zootaxa 4668 (1): 89-104, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4668.1.5
